mapper.select: SELECT T2.LETTER_NO AS LETTER_NO FROM TBL_USER TU INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(LETTER_NO) AS LETTER_NO , LETTER_SEND_ID FROM TBL_LETTER WHERE LETTER_SEND_ID = #{letterSendId} GROUP BY LETTER_SEND_ID )T2 ON TU.USER_ID= T2.LETTER_SEND_ID
select letter_no as letterNo from tbl_letter where letter_receive_id = #{userId} order by regist_dt desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{size} rows only
select letter_no as letterNo from tbl_letter where letter_send_id = #{userId} order by regist_dt desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{size} rows only

SELECT l.letter_no as letterNo, l.letter_title as letterTitle, l.letter_content as letterContent, l.letter_color_no as letterColorNo, sender.user_nickname as senderNickname, receiver.user_nickname as receiverNickname, l.regist_dt as registDate FROM tbl_letter l LEFT JOIN tbl_user sender ON l.letter_send_id = sender.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user receiver ON l.letter_receive_id = receiver.user_id WHERE l.letter_no = #{letterNo}

SELECT l.letter_no as letterNo, l.letter_title as letterTitle, l.letter_content as letterContent, l.letter_color_no as letterColorNo, sender.user_nickname as senderNickname, receiver.user_nickname as receiverNickname, l.regist_dt as registDate FROM tbl_letter l LEFT JOIN tbl_user sender ON l.letter_send_id = sender.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user receiver ON l.letter_receive_id = receiver.user_id WHERE l.letter_no = #{letterNo}
